title: KDE Plasma Down To 1 Wayland Showstopper... Or Is It?
description:
Recently cut down it's lit of True Showstoppers to 1 single issue, but let's actually look at the list and consider what on it, I don't think there's only 1 showstopper left in fact some of the other issues are way more important than the 1 remaining entry.
